description: Source code for the ItemDetailScreen widget in a Flutter app, displaying detailed information about a specific menu item and allowing it to be added to the cart.

classes.name: ItemDetailScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays detailed information about a menu item, including image, name, rating, category, description, price, and an Add to cart button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the item detail screen, fetching the item by ID and displaying its details, with an option to add it to the shopping cart.
